title: x509-certificate
description: This type defines the private-key authentication credential object and is used by agents and targets when performing oauth2 authentication. This object inherits all of the authentication credentials common properties (see section 6.1). In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines two additional specific properties that are valid for this type.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be 'x509-certificate'.

certificate.description: The string encoded version of the X509 certificate.
